amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 118-685 to express the sense of Congress that acts of violence committed on the campus of an institution of higher education are not protected under the First Amendment to the Constitution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
